revision.text: {{also|Yelper}} ==English== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|en|enm|yelpere}}; equivalent to {{suffix|en|yelp|er|id2=agent noun}}. ===Noun=== {{en-noun}} # One who [[yelp]]s. #* {{quote-journal|en|date=July 21, 2009|author=Nate Chinen|title=Vocals That Deliver a Jolt, as ‘Ooh’ Morphs Into ‘Eh’|work=New York Times|url=http://www.nytimes.com/2009/07/21/arts/music/21dirty.html |passage=Mr. Longstreth, who can be a bit of a '''yelper''', sang sweetly, perhaps in search of contrast.}} # {{lb|en|UK|dialect}} The [[avocet]] (so-called from its sharp, shrill cry). # {{lb|en|US|dialect}} A bird, the [[tattler]]. [[Category:en:Scolopacids]] [[Category:en:Shorebirds]]
